languages.text: The Genestealer attacks an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. That enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (4) and the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect.
languages.original_text: Genestealer attacks an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. If target fails reflex check, this attack applies {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g} (4) effect and {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Melting{/g} buff.

languages.text: El genestealer ataca a un enemigo y le inflige {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g}. El enemigo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} o sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} (4) y el efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}derretimiento{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Genestealer attacks an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. That enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (4) and the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: El genestealer ataca a un enemigo y le inflige {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g}. El enemigo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} o sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} (4) y el efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}derretimiento{/g}.

languages.text: ジーンスティーラーは敵1体を攻撃し、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒性ダメージ{/g}を与える。その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}(4)および{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}溶解{/g}効果を受ける。
languages.original_text: The Genestealer attacks an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. That enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (4) and the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: ジーンスティーラーは敵1体を攻撃し、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒性ダメージ{/g}を与える。その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}(4)および{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}溶解{/g}効果を受ける。

languages.text: 基因窃取者攻击一名敌人，造成{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。被命中的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会受到{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（4）与{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}熔化{/g}效果影响。
languages.original_text: The Genestealer attacks an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. That enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (4) and the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: 基因窃取者攻击一名敌人，造成{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。被命中的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会受到{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（4）与{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}熔化{/g}效果影响。

languages.text: Der Symbiont greift einen Gegner an und fügt ihm {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g} zu. Misslingt die {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} des Gegners auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, wird er mit den Effekten {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} (4) und {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Schmelzen{/g} belegt.
languages.original_text: The Genestealer attacks an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. That enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (4) and the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: Der Symbiont greift einen Gegner an und fügt ihm {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g} zu. Misslingt die {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} des Gegners auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, wird er mit den Effekten {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} (4) und {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Schmelzen{/g} belegt.

languages.text: Le Genestealer attaque un ennemi et lui inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g}. La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. En cas d'échec, elle subit les effets {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (4) {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Fusion{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Genestealer attacks an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. That enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (4) and the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: Le Genestealer attaque un ennemi et lui inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g}. La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. En cas d'échec, elle subit les effets {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (4) {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Fusion{/g}.

languages.text: Генокрад атакует противника, нанося {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичный урон{/g}. Цель совершает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}, и в случае провала на нее накладываются {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} (4) и {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}плавление{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Genestealer attacks an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. That enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (4) and the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: Генокрад атакует противника, нанося {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичный урон{/g}. Цель совершает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}, и в случае провала на нее накладываются {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} (4) и {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}плавление{/g}.

Генокрад атакует противника, нанося {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичный урон{/g}. Цель совершает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}, и в случае провала на нее накладываются {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} (4) и {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}плавление{/g}.

languages.text: Gençalan, bir düşmana saldırarak {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toksik hasar{/g} verir. Düşman, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} (4) ve {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}erime{/g} etkilerine maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: The Genestealer attacks an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. That enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (4) and the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect.
